flare.qpolgrad package¶

Submodules¶

flare.qpolgrad.base module¶

class flare.qpolgrad.base.BaseQPolicyGradient(env_fn: Callable, actorcritic: Callable, seed: Optional[int] = 0, steps_per_epoch: Optional[int] = 4000, replay_size: Optional[int] = 1000000, gamma: Optional[float] = 0.99, polyak: Optional[float] = 0.95, pol_lr: Optional[float] = 0.001, q_lr: Optional[float] = 0.001, hidden_sizes: Union[tuple, list, None] = (256, 128), bs: Optional[int] = 100, warmup_steps: Optional[int] = 10000, update_after: Optional[int] = 1000, update_every: Optional[int] = 50, act_noise: Optional[float] = 0.1, buffer: Optional[float] = <class 'flare.kindling.buffers.ReplayBuffer'>, save_freq: Optional[int] = 1, state_preproc: Optional[Callable] = None, state_sze: Union[int, tuple, None] = None, logger_dir: Optional[str] = None, tensorboard: Optional[bool] = True, save_states: Optional[bool] = False, save_screen: Optional[bool] = False)¶

Bases: object

Function to compute policy loss

learn(epochs, horizon=1000, num_test_episodes=10, **kwargs)¶
abstract logger_tabular_to_dump()¶

Function to log tabular logger outputs for the particular algorithm. Should not call logger.dump_tabular(). This will be called for you.

abstract setup_optimizers(pol_lr, q_lr)¶

Function to initialize optimizers

test_agent(num_test_episodes, max_ep_len)¶
abstract update(data, timer=None)¶

Update rule for algorithm

flare.qpolgrad.ddpg module¶

class flare.qpolgrad.ddpg.DDPG(env_fn: Callable, actorcritic: Callable = <class 'flare.kindling.neuralnets.FireDDPGActorCritic'>, seed: Optional[int] = 0, steps_per_epoch: Optional[int] = 4000, replay_size: Optional[int] = 1000000, gamma: Optional[float] = 0.99, polyak: Optional[float] = 0.95, pol_lr: Optional[float] = 0.001, q_lr: Optional[float] = 0.001, hidden_sizes: Union[tuple, list, None] = (256, 128), bs: Optional[int] = 100, warmup_steps: Optional[int] = 10000, update_after: Optional[int] = 1000, update_every: Optional[int] = 50, act_noise: Optional[float] = 0.1, buffer: Optional[float] = <class 'flare.kindling.buffers.ReplayBuffer'>, save_freq: Optional[int] = 1, state_preproc: Optional[Callable] = None, state_sze: Union[int, tuple, None] = None, logger_dir: Optional[str] = None, tensorboard: Optional[bool] = True, save_states: Optional[bool] = False, save_screen: Optional[bool] = False)¶

Bases: flare.qpolgrad.base.BaseQPolicyGradient

Implementation of the Deep Deterministic Policy Gradient (DDPG) algorithm.

class flare.qpolgrad.td3.TD3(env_fn: Callable, actorcritic: Callable = <class 'flare.kindling.neuralnets.FireTD3ActorCritic'>, seed: Optional[int] = 0, steps_per_epoch: Optional[int] = 4000, replay_size: Optional[int] = 1000000, gamma: Optional[float] = 0.99, polyak: Optional[float] = 0.95, pol_lr: Optional[float] = 0.001, q_lr: Optional[float] = 0.001, hidden_sizes: Union[tuple, list, None] = (256, 128), bs: Optional[int] = 100, warmup_steps: Optional[int] = 10000, update_after: Optional[int] = 1000, update_every: Optional[int] = 50, act_noise: Optional[float] = 0.1, noise_clip: Optional[float] = 0.5, policy_delay: Optional[int] = 2, target_noise: Optional[float] = 0.2, buffer: Optional[float] = <class 'flare.kindling.buffers.ReplayBuffer'>, save_freq: Optional[int] = 1, state_preproc: Optional[Callable] = None, state_sze: Union[int, tuple, None] = None, logger_dir: Optional[str] = None, tensorboard: Optional[bool] = True, save_states: Optional[bool] = False, save_screen: Optional[bool] = False)¶
